definition: to occur at the same time (of two things)/to be mingled/to accompany each other
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to feel a mixture of love and hate

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕獲知真相驚怒交加，指責童四季攻於心計。

sentences.english: Happiness accompanied by sadness is a complex emotion of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 悲喜交加是人類一份最複雜的感覺。

sentences.english: Since then, I have a love-hate relationship with PR.
sentences.chinese: 從此以後，我對公關愛恨交加。

sentences.english: It rained heavily while it was thundering. And it had a strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 但是昨天的天氣糟糕極了，狂風大作，雷雨交加。

sentences.english: He became sad and angry when he saw pictures of hungry people in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 當他看到非洲饑民的畫面時，他悲憤交加。

sentences.english: There will be a heavy storm with thunder and lightning tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚將有雷電交加的大暴雨。

sentences.english: But after six years of a stormy marriage, Cewe decided to end it.
sentences.chinese: 六載婚姻生活，風雨交加，賽維決定結束這種婚姻。

sentences.english: But then one stormy night, Zhang Axi disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 但是一個風雨交加的夜晚，張阿喜不見了。

sentences.english: I remember it clearly, one night, I was caught in a pouring rain, and then I suffered from a high fever.
sentences.chinese: 我記得很清楚，一個風雨交加的夜晚，我發燒了。

sentences.english: William was angered and embarrassed by his oversight.
sentences.chinese: 威廉因爲自己的疏忽而羞憤交加。

sentences.english: VINCENT VAN GOGH seemed made for a bittersweet Hollywood biopic.
sentences.chinese: 文森梵高的一生就像一部悲喜交加的好萊塢人物傳。

sentences.english: Severe weather conditions hindered the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 風雨交加的天氣妨礙了營救。

sentences.english: Bereavements and blessings, one following another, make us sad and biessed by turns.
sentences.chinese: 喪親之痛和緈褔祝願，彼此相接，使我們悲喜交加。

sentences.english: The family groped in the darkness, amid thunder and lightning.
sentences.chinese: 雷電交加，一家四口在黑暗中摸索着。

sentences.english: This composite shot was taken as a summer electrical storm hit Athens, Greece.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭展示的是風雨交加的夜晚，雷電襲擊希臘雅典。

definition: to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
variant of 憤恨|愤恨[fen4 hen4]
